reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Interesting Vampire Romance.
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed reading this story. It was very entertaining with a little bit of humor. Ero was so out of touch with the era she was in and Dr. Annie Golden was in her own little world because she literally lived in her research lab and office. Both are a perfect for for each other. I was disappointed how it ended. I didn't expect it to end at Annie 's dad Christmas dinner. Though it didn't change my opinion of this story. I definitely recommend this story to everyone that loves romance even if it is between a vampire and a human. I hope there is a book 2.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of Laughs!
reviews.reviewText: A very fun spin on the sapphic vampire romance. Ero is over 2000 years old but she has definitely not kept up with times as she is very separated from her food or you know us humans. All told in a comical fashion from how she preys and how she fumbles through meeting the one human that changes her everything. Some spice that flows well with the story and their connection. Definitely a fun read!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Short and Sweet
reviews.reviewText: It’s not very long, but it doesn’t fee rushed to me. It was sweet and the thought of an ancient vampire being so out of touch with modern society makes me laugh.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun and light lesbian vampire romance
reviews.reviewText: As a vampire over 2,000 years old, Ero doesn't feel much except when it comes to the kill. Yet when she meets Annie Golden, her heart starts to yearn once more. As a hematologist, Annie is enthralled by Ero, but she can't get her out of her mind and begins to feel so much more for the mysterious vampire.This was a fun and light short paranormal romance read. Ero is a very old vampire, and sometimes doesn't get the nuances of the modern world. Thus leading to some funny situations. Nines being my favorite of those! Annie is a sweetheart, and just the right person to get Ero's heart beating again. Ero was sometimes hard to connect to in her point of view, and I would have loved if it was all from Annie's point of view to keep the mystery around Ero. But I totally get the attraction! Such steamy scenes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I’m a sucker for vampire romance, but a sapphic vampire romance?!? Sign me up! Just My Type is hilarious, sweet, and so good! Ero is this super serious clueless vampire with little knowledge of anything, which had me cracking up most of the book, and Annie is a sweet nerd who is a blood researcher. So of course, they are the perfect match. If you’re looking for a quick read that is going to keep you laughing, then Just My Type is the book for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars An entertaining book with a vampire lesbian lover theme.
reviews.reviewText: Like many people, there have been times where I have been fascinated by Vampire novels, an example being “Interview with a Vampire.” I not only read the book I have also seen the movie several times starring Tom Cruise and Brad Pitt. This is why when I saw this 147-page paperback book (Just my type: A lesbian Vampire Romance by Lucy Bexley and Bryce Oakley) on Amazon I decided to purchase it. For some reason I originally thought this was a graphic novel, but it is not; nevertheless, I was happy with the quick delivery service.Since I do like the strange and unusual at times, I was pleasantly surprised that I liked this Lesbian Vampire romance story. Ero has been a vampire for 2000 years and has just moved to Sorrow, Massachusetts. Little did she know she would meet Dr. Annie Golden who is a researcher investigating a rare blood disease.Their sexual attraction to each other becomes intense and if you are into Vampire and lesbian novels you will enjoy this book. I found it to be a fun read.Rating: 4 Stars. Joseph J. Truncale (Author: Zen Poetry Moments: Haiku and Senryu for special occasions).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I adored this book. Ero is super cute and Annie is dazzling. I wasn’t sure what I expected when I started this but I was pleasantly surprised. I hope there is a part 2 because there is a lot more I’d love to be explored. Ero’s past life, Kendra and just Ero and Annie love. I thought it was well written and I laughed out loud at Ero’s funniness. Truly enjoyed! Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Such a clever and imaginative story. Loved Ero and her naivety surrounding human behavior. So fun! And Annie is so straightforward and loving. And of course, the two pups! Thoroughly enjoyed this read and the works of these two authors!

reviews.reviewTitle: surprised that it was really good
reviews.reviewText: This is the first sapphic story I have ready in months that doesn’t use derogatory worsts, and actions during the love making scenes! Very well done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: This book is laugh-out-loud funny, It’s sexy, steamy, and brilliant
reviews.reviewText: This book is laugh-out-loud funny, It’s sexy, steamy, and brilliant, and I'm so glad I read it. The chemistry between Ero and Annie is palpable and I absolutely loved the storyline, I'm loving the whole a vampire romance trop (if you call it that 🤷‍♀️) and this is my third one so far and I can honestly say I will continue to read them. Side note - Canine, aka Nines (Ero's dog), is so adorable, and the way Ero looks after her makes my heart melt.This book is dark and not for the faint-hearted as it is a little gorey, but it's such a great read, and if you like a vampire romance, then I highly recommend you read it too.Star rating. ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️Spice rating. 🔥🔥🔥🔥

reviews.reviewTitle: Its very thin but have a lot of details and is very accurate
reviews.reviewText: Like I said it has so much details and it is so fun to read like u need to see it yourself, there is maybe 3 spicy scenes… I won’t say more but I recommend this to all of you.

I loved this book so much. It made me laugh out loud many times and by the end I really wished it would continue, somehow. I hope to get to see a second book, following the story of these two amazing characters who had stolen my heart.
I spent a very pleasant moment while reading this amazing story. I laughed a lot. I really recommend this book.
